attributes.action: No to any attack on Iran. There is no basis for an assault. We are still looking for Saddams alleged WMDs. We dont want to make the same mistake twice
attributes.additional_details: Iran poses no threat to the UK or Europe and has never invaded another country. To attack Iran on such limited evidence will be indefensable. Especially as Israel has over 100 nuclear missiles and yet no one says a word about it.
